availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: James M. Gilbert (Carter County, KY, farmhand and private USA)

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmhand and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of William Gilbert and Jane Gilbert. Student in Carter County in 1850. Farmhand in Carter County in 1860. Served in the 22nd Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from December 12, 1862, to December 26, 1864. Served in the 7th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as a private from December 26, 1864, to February 27, 1865.

ab.bibl:
